data.title: Schluchsee Vacation Rentals & Homes - Baden-Württemberg, Germany
data.meta_description: Aug 19, 2024 - Rent from people in Schluchsee, Germany from € 18/night. Find unique places to stay with local hosts in 191 countries. Belong anywhere with Airbnb.
data.text:
Cottage in Weilheim

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 215 reviews4.94 (215)

Small house/cottage with great view and cozy fireplace

Breakfast under the apple tree or an evening in front of the fireplace – this original house makes it possible. Through the large windows, you have a magnificent view of the Swiss Alps. And if you want to soak up the sun, you can relax on the terrace or in the garden. Cozy living space. Magnificent panoramic views into the valley and with good views into the Swiss Alps. With Swedish stove comfortably heated. Have breakfast under the apple tree, read a book in the sun lounger or go hiking directly from the house in the beautiful southern Black Forest. Shopping in the historic Waldshut with beautiful cafes and restaurants. Traditional inns with local products in the immediate vicinity. Cities such as Zurich or Freiburg are ideal for a day trip. Feel free to give tips for activities in the area and be available as a contact person The house is located on the outskirts of the village in the holiday park Südschwarzwald [South Black Forest] and is surrounded by an extensive network of hiking trails. Traditional inns with local produce are nearby, and Zurich and Freiburg are ideal for a day trip. The car can be parked directly at the house. Train stations can be reached in 8 minutes by taxi. With the cone card, which is included, the public transport in the Black Forest can be used free of charge by bus and train. For example, you can take a trip to Freiburg on the Höllentalbahn. Ideal place to give yourself peace and relaxation. Cooking spaghetti, listening to good music, with a bottle of wine and a crackling fireplace. Breakfast under the apple tree. Wonderful nature directly from the cottage.

Rental unit in Balzhausen

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 294 reviews4.97 (294)

4 1/2-room holiday apartment in a horse farm

The apartment is situated in the upper Floor of a farm with horses. It is completely renovated and new. The cosy terrace is staffed with a lounge, charcoal barbecue, sunloungers and sunshade and invites to linger on sunny days. The sauna in the barn can be used against a fee (10 EUR per use). Space to bring your own horse available as well as guided trail rides on pre-arrangement and against fee. Please note, that with entrance of the barn the smell of horses is unavoidable.
